forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 9C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. ESE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. ESE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. NE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny in the morning then increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 59F. NE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
